articles.title: Explained: Why France Has Banned The Sale Of iPhone 12 - NDTV
articles.description: France has asked Apple to stop selling the iPhone 12, claiming that the device emits electromagnetic radiation levels that are above European Union (EU) standards for exposure. France's radiation watchdog,
